moves.1. Nc3: 1. Nc3 not a normal first move but not bad, good for taking theory whoars out of their comfort zone.
moves.1... e6 2. d4 d5 3. Bf4 Nf6 4. Nb5: an unprincipled response white moves a piece twice in the opening
moves.4... Bd6 5. Bg5 Bd7 6. Nxd6+ cxd6 7. a4: a4? this move does not help complete whites development
moves.7... Nc6 8. Qd3: Qd3?  The queen could easily be put under attack in this position better would be nf3
moves.8... h6 9. Bxf6 Qxf6 10. O-O-O O-O 11. e: h5 black is not afraid of ghosts
moves.18... Rc7xc2+ 19. Kb1 g5 20. Qxb7: Qxb7?? leaving the center and the b1-h7 diagnal weak
